webvisualization FastApi¶

webvisualization.FastAPI_docs(request: starlette.requests.Request)¶

webvisualization.get_country_list()¶

Returns list of all countries.

Returns:

country_list [list]: all countries with covide reported.

Called when run as a script

Should launch your web app
